name: Feature Request
about: Suggest enhancement
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
---

## Feature
What would you like added?

## Use Case
Why? When would you use this?

## Proposed Solution
How should it work?

## Priority
- [ ] Critical (blocking)
- [ ] High (significant improvement)
- [ ] Medium (nice to have)
- [ ] Low (idea)
